argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clmvneg1.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmvneg1.n | |- N = ( invg ` W ) |
| 3 |  | clmvneg1.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 4 |  | clmvneg1.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_clmzss | |- ( W e. CMod -> ZZ C_ ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sseldd | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 e. ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 5 | #P_clmneg | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ 1 e. ( Base ` F ) ) -> -u 1 = ( ( invg ` F ) ` 1 ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpdan | |- ( W e. CMod -> -u 1 = ( ( invg ` F ) ` 1 ) ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_clm1 | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 = ( 1r ` F ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( ( invg ` F ) ` 1 ) = ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( W e. CMod -> -u 1 = ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> -u 1 = ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( -u 1 .x. X ) = ( ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) .x. X ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` F ) = ( 1r ` F ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` F ) = ( invg ` F ) |
| 19 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 17, 18 | #P_lmodvneg1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) .x. X ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( ( invg ` F ) ` ( 1r ` F ) ) .x. X ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( -u 1 .x. X ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
